name: Wild West Rollercoaster
description: Experience the thrill of the Wild West Rollercoaster as it twists and turns through the canyons.

name: Rose Garden
description: Take a leisurely stroll through the beautiful Rose Garden, filled with a variety of colorful roses.

name: Bucking Bronco
description: Hold on tight as you ride the Bucking Bronco, a thrilling mechanical bull ride.

name: Ferris Wheel
description: Enjoy a bird's eye view of the park from the top of the Ferris Wheel.

name: Butterfly Garden
description: Step into the Butterfly Garden and be surrounded by colorful butterflies of all shapes and sizes.

name: Haunted House
description: Brave the Haunted House and experience spine-chilling scares around every corner.

name: Water Park
description: Cool off and make a splash at the Water Park with thrilling slides and lazy rivers.
